translated: Having taken a garland in my hand,ğŸ”½and having circumambulated him,
having worshipped the Teacher,
I departed facing north.
Because of that deed, O Leader of Men,

I attained Complete Emancipation,
all my existences have been destroyed.
For one hundred and eighteen eons,
the gift I gave then,
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of the lion throne.
For seven hundred eons from now,
the one who will attain Complete Emancipation will be a noble,
endowed with the seven treasures,
a powerful Universal Monarch.
